docs.text: it was with great trepidation that i approached +mary+ , the farrelly brothers+ latest film .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: i knew the film would be funny--the trailer alone had me laugh harder than the actual comedy i went to see .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: but i also knew the film would be an equal-opportunity offender , attacking the sensibilities of the politically correct with reckless abandon .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: i figured the film would be raunchy , maybe another lucky escapee from nc-17 hell .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: i may laugh , but would i feel better in the morning ?
docs.label: positive

docs.text: i needn+t have worried .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: +mary+ is the sweetest , warmest , all-out laugh-and-grossfest this side of _animal house_ .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: surprisingly , the farrelly brothers have walked that very tight line of making a touching romantic comedy on the side , and filling the details with five or six outrageous howlers .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: they make laughter , the toughest job for a filmmaker to do , look easy .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the plot is typical .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: thirteen years ago , geeky ted ( ben stiller ) lucked out in having dazzling mary ( cameron diaz ) go with him to the senior prom .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: as luck would have it , on that very day , he was hospitalized .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: why , i shall not tell , but i assure you , it isn+t pretty .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he hires a private investigator to find her : pat healy ( matt dillon ) .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he becomes one of the great comic villains .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: upon finding her , he too is lovestruck , and so pursues her , lying about his occupation and getting his teeth capped .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it is only a matter of time before ted finds out that he had been double-crossed , and goes to get her for himself .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: would the geek get the girl ?
docs.label: positive

docs.text: puh-lease .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the ending is pure hollywood ; no surprises there .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: but the absolute joy in this film is how this simple premise allows for humor in zippers , hair gel , the mentally disabled , the physically handicapped , interracial marriages , homosexuals , skin conditions , serial killers , tanning , and drugged-up dogs .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the dog on speed sequence alone is worth the price of admission , and belongs in the film comedy hall of fame .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: and yet , for all the targets that are hit , the film maintains its sweet tone .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: mary , playing the straight role , is as sweet and caring as she is beautiful .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: she is totally devoted to caring for her mentally handicapped brother , warren ( w .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: earl brown--miles away from the cameraman in _scream_ ) .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: mary+s sunniness carries the film here--it compliments the below-belt gags that come at you .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: cameron diaz makes her totally charming , and the audience respects her , even though women in general do not usually undress before an open window .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: ben stiller also fares very well , totally changing his image from his _reality bites_ and _flirting with disaster_ straight men to being a , ( how to say it ? ) , a complete loser .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: braces , greasy long hair , not too bright , and very very funny .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: dillon is exceptionally creepy , especially with his capped teeth .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: and rounding out the cast is ted+s friend dom ( chris elliot ) , tanning addict magda ( lin shaye ) , modern troubador/greek chorus ron lichman , and mary+s sweet mom , markie post ( where has she been ? ! ) .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: not everything works .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: chris elliot+s role , skin blemishes and all , becomes merely tasteless and boring .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: there+s lousy dialogue about eight-minute vs . seven minute exercise tapes .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: and there are long stretches without much going on .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: but the wait is worth it .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: when those extraordinary sequences hit , the entire theater erupted with howls , tears .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: belly-aches , that in some sequences carried over to the following scene .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the farrelly brothers have finally done it .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: yes , there are some raunchy bits , but when it is all over , it+s not nearly as bad as it could have been .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: while tasteless , it didn+t cross any lines , at least not with me .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: while raunchy , it wasn+t nearly as bad as _porky+s_ or _boogie nights_ .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: and it is sweet enough to be considered a date flick .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: after the funny but sour _kingpin_ left a negative aftertaste in my palate , comes the funniest sex farce since _a fish called wanda_ .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: approach this with an open mind , and you will reap the benefits hugely .
